name: QlikView Extension
summary: Learn about .QAR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QAR files are saved in a compressed .ZIP format. They contain an XML definition file, JavaScript (.JS) files, a .PNG extension icon image, a .QVPP properties file, and optional data source files.
NOTE: Extensions were introduced with QlikView version 10.

description: Add-on file used by QlikView, a data analysis program used for business intelligence reporting; stores an archive of files, which specifies a new visualization or user interface component; sometimes used for integrating third-party visualizations.
